data.comment: The big names in today's match at Liberty Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Swansea.
In the minute 12, Harlee Dean (Birmingham) gets a yellow card.
Gavin Ward blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 63, The away team have replaced Jon Toral with Gary Gardner. This is the first substitution made today by Aitor Karanka.
Swansea make their first substitution with Liam Cullen replacing Jamal Lowe.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
